docs.text: Believe analysis Web: https://jinghuazhao.github.io/Believe CSD3 location: ~/rds/[rds-jmmh2-]post_qc_data/believe TOPMed imputation data by Regeneron for the full ~72,000 participants. ~/rds/[rds-jmmh2-post]_qc_data/believe/genotype/imputed where files have Freeze_Two in the name instead of Freeze_One . PCs in place (counterpart to the sequenced variants, ~/rds/[rds-jmmh2-]post_qc_data/believe/genotype/genomewide/plink/aug_2023 ??). A growing list of scripts. 1_desc.sh 1. Descriptive analysis 1_desc.sh is to extract data and to protoype some canonical options for handling relatedness in the study.
